description: Uploads a batch of log events to the specified log stream.
mitreAttackSubTechniques: T1562.008 - Impair Defenses: Disable or Modify Cloud Logs

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: The attacker leverages CloudWatchLogs as an AWS web service to exfiltrate data, making it blend in with legitimate service use.
The attacker uses PutLogEvents to upload sensitive data to CloudWatchLogs, which can then be accessed remotely as part of their command and control strategy.
The attacker stages collected data on the local system and then uses PutLogEvents to upload it to CloudWatchLogs for further use or exfiltration.

incidents.description: Cloud Security Stories: From Risky Permissions to Ransomware Execution

securityImplications: Attackers might use PutLogEvents to add benign log entries, effectively burying any signs of his malicious activities.
